Html:
Hi,

I'm trying to write into a cell a third party formula, i.e., not a native Excel formula. We use Office Connector Excel plug-in to connect to an ERP called Sage. This plug-in enables a new set of formulas, including one called TSIMPORT.

When I write with the library "=TSIMPORT(...)" with all the correct parameters and values, Excel treats it as a string unless I manually click on the cell to edit the content, make no changes and hit Enter. Only then, Excel will consider it a formula. Of course this does not happen if I manually type the formula in Excel.

Not sure if there's something that I'm setting wrong or there's another approach.

Thanks for your help.
PHPExcel does not support any functions that are not native Excel functions
